info.description:
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/Kit-Scribe/pycolorize.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/Kit-Scribe/pycolorize) # A simple colorizer which keep the color of all lines and sublines Current version is: `v1.0.2` **To install use:** $pip install --upgrade pycolorize OR $pip3 install --upgrade pycolorize **Find docs [here](/docs)** **Find examples [here](/docs/examples)**

Examples of output:

![](/docs/images/pycolorize1_cut.png) ![](/docs/images/pycolorize2_cut.png)

info.name: pycolorize
info.summary: colorized output with no broken color lines
info.html_description:
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/Kit-Scribe/pycolorize.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/Kit-Scribe/pycolorize)

# A simple colorizer which keep the color of all lines and sublines

Current version is: v1.0.2

To install use:

$pip install –upgrade pycolorize OR $pip3 install –upgrade pycolorize

Find docs [here](/docs)

Find examples [here](/docs/examples)

<h2>Examples of output:</h2>

![](/docs/images/pycolorize1_cut.png) ![](/docs/images/pycolorize2_cut.png)
